title: Interpretation of a dream about my husband looking at others

preview.html: This dream is one of the things that disturbs a woman during her sleep and raises many questions in her mind, so in today's article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about seeing my husband looking at someone else. Interpretation of a dream that my husband looks at someone else in a dream by Ibn Sirin There are many different interpretations of a dream about seeing my husband looking at someone else, and this is according to the psychological state of the woman and what she sees in her life with her husband and what her subconscious mind depicts to her. The next part will show you some of these interpretations such as: Some believe that a woman who dreams that her husband is looking at someone else in a dream. It is a sign of love and intense jealousy for her husband. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is looking at someone else. It is also an indication of the strength of the relationship between a man and his wife and a testimony to the pure relationship that brings them together. Some dream interpreters also believe that seeing a man looking at someone other than his wife in a dream. It is an indication that the problems and disputes between them will end soon, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about my husband kissing someone else in a dream by Ibn Sirin There are also many women who dream that the husband is kissing another woman. Therefore, this dream causes a kind of intense anger for the wife, and in the next part we will learn about the interpretation of this dream, which is: If a woman dreams that her husband is kissing another woman. This dream is evidence of the wife’s jealousy of her husband and evidence of the intense love for her husband and the stability they enjoy in life. A woman who dreams that her husband is kissing another woman in a dream. This dream is an indication that there are many fears in the woman’s subconscious. This dream is also evidence that the husband helps his wife in many matters in life. This dream is also evidence of The husband's loyalty to his wife and his great love for her. Interpretation of a dream about a woman chasing my husband If a man sees in his dream that a woman is chasing him. This dream indicates that he is disturbed and cannot make the right decision at this time. Also, a pregnant woman dreams that a woman is chasing her husband. This dream indicates that she will give birth to a healthy child, God willing. A woman who dreams that a woman is chasing her husband. This dream is a sign that she is hiding some things from her husband in life. For a woman who dreams that a woman is chasing her husband. This dream is a sign that she will suffer in the next pregnancy, and God Almighty knows best. If a man sees in a dream that he is running away from another woman in a dream. This dream indicates escaping from the crises and problems that surround him in his life. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of seeing my husband's brother's wife in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a husband leaving his wife If a man sees in a dream that he is leaving his wife. This dream is a sign of the problems and disputes that are occurring between them at the present time. If the husband sees in a dream that he is rebuking his wife and leaving her. This dream is a sign of the great love that exists between the spouses. The dream in which the husband sees that he is leaving his wife after her death. This dream indicates falling into Many different calamities and crises in life. And whoever sees in a dream that his wife is angry after he left her in the dream. This dream is an indication of

title: Interpretation of the dream of the king by Ibn Sirin and the great translators

preview.html: Interpretations of dreams about the king are among the dreams that indicate the achievement of goals and ambitions that the dreamer has planned for a long time and have many positive and negative connotations, which we will learn about in detail below. Interpretation of a dream about the king: A person seeing the king in a dream may indicate that he wants to achieve many goals and has high ambitions in Many things. Seeing a king in a dream shows a person the goods and livelihood that the dreamer will obtain, and that he will obtain a prestigious job and a place that he has been planning to reach for some time. A person’s vision of a king in a dream symbolizes that he is a meticulous person and focuses on how to achieve goals and get what He wants. If a person sees the king and his red dress in a dream, this is a sign of illness, exposure to harm, and preoccupation with worldly pleasures without paying attention to the responsibilities that the fortuneteller bears. A person seeing the king’s head in a dream is a sign of achieving ambitions, achieving lofty goals that he has been seeing for some time, and improving circumstances. His life is for the better. Seeing someone fighting with the king symbolizes that he is trying to defend the truth with all his might. The dreamer is watching the king while he sleeps comfortably in his bed, and this is evidence of comfort and the loss of worry and anxiety that the dreamer feels in his life in the coming period, God willing. Interpretation of the king’s dream for Ibn The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing the king in a dream as good news for its owner, and a sign of kindness, sustenance, and blessings for the dreamer. The dreamer’s vision of the king in his dream shows his continuous research and hard work until he reaches his goals that he has been planning for some time. Seeing the king in a dream when he is old Age is an indication of the past and the events that the dreamer constantly remembers and that greatly influenced him. But if one sees the king in a dream and he is young, this is an indication of the plans he seeks for in the future and obtaining projects that will increase his financial income in the coming period. Seeing a person in Dreaming of a king’s crown indicates the famous status and beautiful life that the dreamer enjoys at that time, but if he sees the king’s crown and someone takes it off, this is a bad sign for the dreamer and it may be a sign that he will be harmed in his workplace. Seeing the king in a dream and his teeth were very strong and well-made. Of iron, this indicates the strength and courage of the dreamer and his ability to solve problems in his life in the right way. Interpretation of a dream about a king for a single woman: An unmarried girl who sees the king in her dream symbolizes the lofty goals that she wants to reach one day and focus on them completely. Dreaming about a girl who has nothing to do with the king It indicates that she has an adventurous spirit and the courage to try things until she gets what she wants, which makes her resilient in the face of the problems she faces. A girl watching the king in her dream could be a reflection of the progress and success she has achieved in her life on all levels. An unmarried girl seeing the king indicates On the characteristics of the person who appoints him, and he must be wealthy and prestigious. In general, seeing a king in a person’s dream is an indication of his achievement.

title: The symbol of waste in Ibn Sirin’s dream

preview.html: Stool in a dream. Stool is the product that comes out of the body after digesting food and is often accompanied by a foul and foul odor. The dreamer is a man or a woman, and if he only sees it, eats it, vomits it, or depending on where it is as well, and other symbols that we will explain in detail during the article. Feces in a dream. In the interpretation of a dream about excrement, its scholars mentioned many indications, the most important of which are the following: Seeing waste fluids in A dream means spending a lot of money or distributing it to others. Watching a person’s excrement during sleep shows the secrets he is hiding or things that no one wants to know. If one dreams of worms in the stool, this is a sign that he will have many children and will continue to have offspring and will It has unrighteous relatives who want to take all his money. When one sees feces in a dream on a high place, such as a hill or a mountain, this is a sign of dedication and sincerity in work. Seeing feces in a dream means relief from distress if the dreamer is suffering from debts that have accumulated on him. Enter website About the secrets of dream interpretation, Google it and you will find all the interpretations you are looking for. Feces in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - mentioned that seeing feces in a dream has many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: Happiness in a dream means removing distress and anxiety from the dreamer’s chest. And everything that causes him distress and sadness, as the dream indicates that he is an honest and sincere person who always supports his friends with joy and sadness. Watching feces during sleep indicates that the dreamer will soon communicate with a new person in his life. If one dreams that there is a lot of feces soiling his clothes, this is a sign However, one will waste a lot of money in the coming days. Seeing feces in a dream indicates charity, zakat given by the dreamer, sincere repentance to God, and determination not to return to sin again. Feces in a single woman’s dreamWhen a girl dreams of seeing feces, this is a sign On the abundance of sustenance from the Lord - the Almighty - and the acquisition of great wealth that allows her to buy everything she needs, in addition to soon receiving good news that improves her psychologically and materially. the conditions. A single woman seeing feces in her sleep indicates the end of a difficult period in her life and the arrival of happiness, contentment, comfort and stability in her life. Scientists also said that defecating in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes his ability to adapt to the circumstances of his life, and if he faces some crises, he can confront them and end them quickly. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she finds it difficult to defecate, this is a sign that she will suffer in her life and will not be able to get rid of it, which will cause her distress and misery, but it will end soon by God’s will. Stool in a dream for a married woman. If a woman dreams of stool, this is a sign of happiness and blessings that will enter her life and a feeling of peace and peace of mind. If a married woman sees her stool during sleep, this means that she will soon hear some happy news. And if she sees in a dream that her husband excretes his stool in Ham

title: Interpretation of a dream about worms coming out of the leg

preview.html: If he was walking and worms came out of his feet, then this indicates a wrong path and great sins committed by the dreamer, and he committed sins and forbidden things without turning from this path, and black worms show a bad end for the dreamer, so follow us for more interpretations. Interpretation of seeing worms coming out of the leg in a dream for a girl One: If an unmarried woman sees in a dream black worms coming out of her leg and she is suffering from severe pain. The meaning indicates that there are no good and bad things that she does in her life. Even though she walked alone on the dark path and the worms walked on her leg. It indicates the sins that she is committing. In her life, she must return from this path. The worm emerging from the foot of an unmarried fiancé indicates the bad deeds and sins that she commits with her fiancé at this time in her life. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is removing worms from her leg and is happy with their disappearance, it indicates her salvation. From the path of sins and disobedience and returning to the path of Almighty God. Or seeing a single woman looking at a large worm coming out of her leg. Here it refers to the abominations that she commits and that she is walking on this path of her own free will, and God has announced it. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing worms in Dream interpretation of seeing worms coming out of the leg in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her leg is expelling a lot of worms and she is suffering from severe pain. It shows that there are wrong things she is doing now. And if a married woman sees her husband looking at worms coming out of his leg in a dream. And she feels sorry for him. Here it refers to the great abominations that her husband commits in his life. And if the married woman saw that the worm was black and large and was walking on her leg. Here it indicates the presence of grave sins and disobedience committed by this married woman. The married woman who sees that she is walking On the path of worms, her feet will be removed in the dream. This indicates that there is a wrong path on which this married woman is walking and committing many forbidden things in her life. As for the dreamer who sees that she is trying to remove the worms from her leg and get rid of them, this indicates that she is doing many bad things in her life and on her. To return to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing worms coming out of the leg in a dream for a divorced woman. If the divorced woman sees that she saw large worms on her leg in a dream and regrets that. It indicates that she is committing a lot of immorality in her life during this time, and God knows best. Either she sees the divorced woman searching for... Something will rid her of the worms that walk on her leg. This explains the presence of illegal things that she does in her life and she must return to God Almighty. And the divorced woman who dreams of worms coming out of her leg. It indicates the presence of great sins that the dreamer commits and makes her happy in her life. Likewise, the divorced woman who dreams of worms coming out of her leg indicates the presence of great sins that the dreamer commits and makes her happy in her life. She looks at her ex-husband’s leg and worms come out of it. This may indicate that there are major problems coming with her husband now, and God knows best. What if a divorced woman saw that her ex-husband was taking her to the street and running worms all over her?

title: Interpretation of a dream about getting a blue pen in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about getting a blue pen in a dream. If you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about getting a blue pen in a dream, and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know the interpretation of, let us get to know the interpretations of the scholars working for this dream, and the reader must know that the officials on the site do not With interpretations, rather they are from the heart. Interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of the dream of receiving a blue pen in a dream. In the event that a person sees that he received a dry blue pen in a dream, this may indicate the harm that the dreamer may face during this period. In the event that a person sees that he received A blue pen in a dream, as this may indicate the dreamer’s need to seek forgiveness and repent from God, Blessed and Most High. Seeing a blue pen in a dream may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. If you see yourself buying a blue pen in a dream, it may indicate This is due to the responsibility that the dreamer has during this time, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about receiving banknotes in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he received a lot of banknotes indicates happiness and joy in life. A dream about receiving banknotes in a dream may indicate Marital happiness that the dreamer was enjoying in his life at that time. Seeing paper money in a dream may indicate the visionary’s diligence in achieving his goals and ambitions. If a married woman sees that she received banknotes in a dream, and there were a lot of them, this may indicate The happiness that she was enjoying in her life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about taking medicine from someone in a dream: It is possible that the vision of taking medicine indicates the dreamer’s good circumstances, thanks to God. Anyone who dreams that he took medicine from someone can indicate The strength of his relationship with him and his strong love. Seeing someone taking medicine in a dream may indicate good changes that occur in the dreamer’s life during this time. If the girl sees that she is taking medicine from someone, this may indicate the happiness that will come in her life at that time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about receiving a slaughtered and clean chicken in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he has been slaughtered and a clean chicken can indicate that his situation will change for the better, thanks to God. In the case of my personal opinion that he received a very clean chicken, this may indicate good changes. In his life in those days. It is possible that the vision of receiving slaughtered and cleaned chickens in a dream indicates a new experience that the dreamer will enter during this period. In my personal opinion, that he took a slaughtered chicken and cleaned the dream, it may indicate the ability of the dreamer to achieve the goals and aspirations of that period, by God. I know. title: Interpretation of seeing a bullet wound in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a bullet wound in a single woman’s dreamWhen a single girl dreams that she has been injured in a dream, there are people near her who are planning conspiracies and harming him and wishing her harm. It indicates the number of relatives or friends who are gossiping about the girl. Perhaps the vision means that the dreamer will hear a speech that hurts her psychologically and hurts her feelings. As for seeing a woman Single? A large store of bullets shows that her future husband will betray her several times. Perhaps the vision means that the people around her are questioning her actions and behavior. title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about his car accident and his survival?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and survival is one of the confusing visions that many people want to know its meaning. This vision indicates many different interpretations and explanations according to what the great dream interpreters said, first and foremost is the scholar Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him. During this article, we will explain to you the correct interpretation of seeing a car accident and surviving it. Interpretation of a dream of a car accident and surviving it. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is driving a car and then is surprised that he is involved in an accident, then the vision indicates that the dreamer feels constant panic and fear. And if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is driving a car Then he had a small accident, this is evidence that the dreamer will face a small problem in his life. If the dreamer sees that he was involved in an accident but survived, this is evidence that the dreamer was going through minor problems in his life, but they will end for the better and be completely resolved. But if the dreamer sees in his dream A car accident occurred and he was able to escape from it. This is an indication that this person will face a big problem, but he will solve it, God willing. Al-Nabulsi interpreted his exposure to an accident and surviving it in a dream as an indication that the dreamer is facing many crises in his life, which are the cause of the problems he is going through, but he will find Solutions to it. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and surviving it by Ibn Sirini. Dreaming about a car accident in a dream indicates some struggle at work that will end in a major loss. Getting into an accident in a dream indicates the emergence of some problems and disagreements between the dreamer and relatives. A car accident and falling into water also indicates tension. And the tension that the viewer suffers from. The accident and surviving it in a dream symbolizes exposure to some disputes between loved ones. As for someone who dreams that he was in an accident due to a difficult road, this indicates that some bad things will follow him. The dream indicates that an accident occurs in a dream after the car’s headlights are cut off. To make some wrong decisions. While anyone dreams that he collided with a car and was involved in an accident, this indicates that he will be exposed to some problems. An online page, Interpretation of dreams online from Google, contains thousands of interpretations that you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about a car accident and remaining single. Interpretation of a dream about a single girl A car accident is evidence that it is related to some special matters in her life and that she will suffer loss. These things will eventually occur. A car accident in the life of a single girl shows that she will make many wrong decisions in her life. A car accident in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates conflicts and problems. It will arise between her and her lover or fiancé, but if she survives the accident, this is evidence that these problems will end and the wedding date is near, a strong will. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream about her car accident and her survival. Interpretation of a dream about an accident for a married woman, this is a sign of making wrong decisions, and in addition Therefore, she was not able to make the right decisions in her life. Seeing a married woman in her dream getting into a car accident and the accident passing smoothly and without injuries is evidence of the stress, terror, or anxiety that she suffers from in her life. When she sees...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a museum in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a museum in a dream Scientists and interpreters have agreed that seeing a museum in a dream indicates that exams and the weight that the viewer is exposed to in his personal or professional life. The vision also indicates the presence of major problems that the viewer suffers from in his life in general and in his professional life in particular. The meaning of seeing a destroyed museum In a dream: Who attends the Wakan Museum? Destroyed: In the dream is a sign of its presence. Judgments. A long wait. The vision may be a warning to the pioneer to be careful. Take care of the people around him. The meaning of seeing a museum full of paintings in a dream. When a man dreams of seeing a museum full of paintings. Antiques and antiquities are considered a great indication that the viewer has received an inheritance containing money. And savings, such as: jewelry. Seeing the museum also shows that I move from one place to another better. Perhaps it indicates a radical change in the emotional life. Be a sign of marriage for single people. It happens pregnancy for married people. And dealing with a girl or getting a new job. It also indicates the journey of the absent person or his return. Different interpretations to see MuseumThe museum in the dream refers to agreements. It exists in a contract between two parties and they are bound by it. As indicated by I know someone, dear news. The importance of visiting the museum. Everyone who observes himself visits the museum. Walking is a testament to his manager’s respect for him at work and his appreciation for him. It aims for the student to excel and his endeavor to achieve the highest academic titles. Seeing someone walking on The museum road is a sign that connects to a lover or lover through marriage. The meaning of seeing a museum ticket in a dream. Who knows? A museum ticket in a dream is a sign of expenses. A new appearance for the viewer. It may indicate a financial loss. Seeing museum expenses in a dream is a sign of lying to a prophet. Interpretation of seeing museum employees and burning the museum. Anyone who sees museum employees in a dream is a sign of his entering the world of representation and reputation. Seeing being inside the museum and a man closing the door on you indicates a stab in the back of someone close to him. Seeing the burning of the museum indicates tolerance between spouses. Add the dream you would like to interpret, with reference to your marital status, in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Seeing a dead person in a dream while he is alive in reality

preview.html: Seeing a dead person bathing in a dream is a sign of his liberation from all the sins he committed in his life, and seeing death in a dream for the dreamer is a sign of repentance and a warning from God Almighty, and we will explain more interpretations through our interpreter website. Interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dream For a single girl, if the unmarried woman who is dreaming sees a living person in a dream and he is dead in the dream and she is very sad for him. The meaning indicates that this person whom you saw is doing bad things in his life. And for an unmarried woman to see in a dream that a living person died and is taking a bath in the dream. This is a sign. To the point that he has absolved himself of all the sins that he committed in his life. And if an unmarried girl sees that the living person has died in the dream and he was talking to her, this is an indication from his words that he is right about the things that he talks about and says in the dream. And an unmarried girl saw in a dream that she She saw a man alive in life and he died in a dream and she is afraid of him. This is an indication of the bad things that this single woman does that affect her. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream laughing and talking. Interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a dead person in a dream while he is dead. In the dream and you feel very sorry for him. This is an indication that this dreamer is committing sins in his life and needs to stop. And if a married woman sees in a dream her husband, and she washes the dead and he is alive in life. I hope that Fidel will help him get rid of the great sins that he is experiencing. Such as seeing A married woman is dead in a dream. This is an indication of the hour of reckoning and the need for her to be accounted for in many of what he does. Either a married woman sees in a dream that she is bathing in a dream and she died. This is an indication that she has been liberated from all the sins and transgressions that she committed in her life during this time. Interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees that her living husband has died in a dream and feels sorry for him. Here it appears that there are many great things and opportunities that this divorced woman will miss now. Although the divorced woman sees that she is dead and accountable in the dream. This indicates... The bad things that this divorced woman does in her life at this time. Seeing the divorced woman searching in a dream for someone to wash her, then she died. This is an indication that there are no good things that this divorced woman continues to do during this time. The divorced woman who dreams of seeing a dead person and talking to her in The dream. Here it explains with a correct sign that this divorced woman will see, and must do in her life. Read also: Interpretation of a dead person crying in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dream about a man and its meaningSimilarly, if the dreamer saw in a dream that he was looking at the deceased and was close to him And he is in fact alive. This is evidence of a major sin committed by this dreamer in his life during this period. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that he died in the dream and was very sorry. The meaning indicates that there are major problems that this person will experience. And if the dreamer looks at the graves in the dream He asked in the dream. This is an indication of the great sins that were committed

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant womanPregnancy is considered one of the most difficult periods for a woman, but at the same time it is the period in which she feels the greatest amount of joy and happiness, and dreamers are scattered between many indicators and interpretations.Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman Many of the most important interpretation scholars said that seeing a pregnant woman in a dream It is a reassuring vision that foretells that the dreamer will change all the affairs of her life for the better and experience many happy events that will make her go away. During many moments of joy and happiness in the coming days. Many of the most prominent interpretation experts interpreted that seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is an indication that God will open before the viewer many doors of livelihood in order to improve his economic and social situation in the coming periods. As some of the most important jurists said The interpretation is that seeing a pregnant woman in the dreamer’s sleep means that he will hear a lot of good news about his personal life soon and it will put him in a state of great joy and make him forget. All the stages of fatigue and sadness that she went through. Interpretation of the dream of a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a pregnant woman in a dream is one of the dreams that has many different meanings that differ depending on the vision of the dreamer, which we will explain negatively in her life. The great scholar Ibn Sirin also said that If the dreamer sees a pregnant woman whom he does not know in her sleep, this is evidence that God will soon provide her with good offspring. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream Pregnant woman in a dream. Many prominent interpretation scholars said that seeing a pregnant woman in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that many happy things will happen that will make her heart very happy in the coming days. In the event that an unmarried woman sees a very beautiful pregnant woman in her dream, this is a sign that she She has achieved many great goals and ambitions that will make her reach a future in which she will have status and status in a short period of time. Many of the most important interpretation experts have confirmed that seeing a pregnant woman during a girl’s sleep indicates the death of all stages of fatigue and sadness that dominated her life in previous periods and have been replaced by days full of joy and great happiness in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman in a dream. Many interpreters agree unanimously on the interpretation. A pregnant woman seeing a married woman in a dream is evidence of her excessive thinking and a strong desire that God will soon bless her with children. Also, seeing a pregnant woman while dreaming of marriage shows many good signs, the most important of which is that she is living her married life without problems and great pressures that make her live a life without You feel comfortable and calm there. There is a lot of love and friendship between her and her husband. But if the dreamer has children and sees in her dream the presence of a pregnant woman, this is a sign that God will fill her life with many blessings and many good things that will
